## Time in Emergency Department

```{r eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, fig.height=4.3, fig.width=7, tidy=FALSE}
  
  admColScale <- make_adm_colour_palette()

  ed_los_data_1 <- ed_los_data[ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month >= 201601 & ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month <= 201603,]
  
  ed_los_data_2 <- ed_los_data[ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month >= 201701 & ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month <= 201703,]

  tryCatch(plot_ed_dist(ed_los_data_1, cumulative = TRUE, prov_codes = pr) + admColScale + labs(subtitle = "Jan 2016 - Mar 2016"), error=function(e) NULL)
  
  cat("  \n")
  
  tryCatch(plot_ed_dist(ed_los_data_2, cumulative = TRUE, prov_codes = pr) + admColScale + labs(subtitle = "Jan 2017 - Mar 2017"), error=function(e) NULL)

```
